DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective observational study analyse demographic , clinical treatment-related data patient non-squamous non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) reach > /= 9 month progression-free survival Avastin ( bevacizumab ) -based first-line therapy . Data collect approximately 9 month .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Patients With Non-Squamous NSCLC Who Reached A Long PFS After Avastin ( Bevacizumab ) -Based First-Line Therapy
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Nonsquamous nonsmall cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) treat firstline Avastinbased therapy Progressionfree survival > /= 9 month reach
